Articles.Content:
When contacts come out I think a cool thing to incorporate into sand box would be a way of creating you own mission with clear objectives. A lot of people say that you sort of have to set your own goals and this would be a way of doing so.

There would be a building to click on and a me he that shows current mission, past missions, or create new.

An example would be my current project of launching 20 fuel drones into LKO. Before the start of the mission I would create the mission profile then build the required ships and execute.

Ship is the VAB or SPH would have and option to be assigned to a certain mission.

Just a suggestion. It would help with keeping track of what random projects you have going on. This or a better thought out variant of it would be cool.
